INVOKE.COMMENT: checking the status of JDEAPG adapters
unlocking the register store for update
Getting the status of the JDEAPGDBStatus key

SEQUENCE.NAME: UP
SEQUENCE.COMMENT: If the status entry is up but database connection is down

INVOKE.COMMENT: unlocking the register store for update
set the Ariba status entry as DOWN

Values.value: JDEAPG Process Monitor : Trigger ShutDown at %dateTime%

INVOKE.COMMENT: unlocking the register store for update
Getting the status of the JDEAPGDBStatus key

SEQUENCE.NAME: DOWN
SEQUENCE.COMMENT: If the status entry is down but database connection is up

INVOKE.COMMENT: unlocking the register store for update
set the JDEAPG status entry as UP

Values.value: JDEAPG Process Monitor : Trigger Resume at %dateTime%
Server name: %fullServerInfo% Error Time: %lastError/time% Error Message: %lastError/error%
